### Using parent_digitizer

The digitizer is a wrapping of several functions. 

```{r}
digtizer_output <- parent_digitizer(curve_location = here("vignettes","KMcurve.png"),
                 sen = 0.3,
                 Wsen_i = 30,
                 OCR_words_i = T,
                 num_curves1 = 2,
                 x_start_i = 0,
                 x_end_i = 10,
                 x_incr = 1,
                 y_start_i = 0,
                 y_end_i = 1,y_incr = 0.25,
                 Y_values_vertical =   T,censoring_i = F )

head(digtizer_output) 

digtizer_output %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = time, y=  St, color = curve, group = curve)) + 
  geom_step()
```
